subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The 20-year-old Ping wedges with square-shaped grooves will no longer be allowed on the PGA Tour starting March 29 under an agreement reached Monday between the tour and Ping.
snippet: The 20-year-old Ping wedges with square-shaped grooves will no longer be allowed on the PGA Tour starting March 29 under an agreement reached Monday between the tour and Ping.
